src: उन्होंने कहा “कि अब हमारे पास 4 महीने उम्र वाले चूहे हैं जिन्हें मधुमेह नहीं है जो मधुमेह के रोगी थे। ”
mt: “We now have mice that are four months old that don't have diabetes who were diabetic,” they said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: डॉ. एहुड उर, नोवा स्कोटिया के हैलिफ़ैक्स में डलहौज़ी विश्वविद्यालय में चिकित्सा के प्रोफ़ेसर और कनाडाई डायबिटीज़ एसोसिएशन के नैदानिक ​​और वैज्ञानिक विभाग के अध्यक्ष ने आगाह किया कि शोध अभी भी अपने शुरुआती दिनों में है.
mt: Dr. Uhan, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's clinical and scientific division, cautioned that research is still in its early days.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: कुछ अन्य विशेषज्ञों की तरह, उन्हें इस बात पर संदेह है कि क्या मधुमेह को ठीक किया जा सकता है, यह देखते हुए कि इन निष्कर्षों की उन लोगों के लिए कोई प्रासंगिकता नहीं है जिन्हें पहले से ही टाइप 1 मधुमेह है.
mt: Like some other experts, he is skeptical that diabetes can be cured, given that these findings are not relevant to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: सोमवार को स्वीडिश अकादमी में साहित्य के लिए नोबेल समिति के स्थायी सचिव, सारा डेनियस, स्वीडन समिति में सेवरिज रेडियो पर एक रेडियो कार्यक्रम के दौरान सार्वजनिक रूप से घोषणा की, कि साहित्य में 2016 के नोबेल पुरस्कार जीतने को लेकर सीधे बॉब डायलन तक पहुँचने में असमर्थ होकर, अपने प्रयासों को छोड़ चुके थे.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy for Literature, announced publicly on Swedish Radio's program "Sveriges Radio" that she had given up trying to reach Bob Dylan directly to inform him that he had won the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: डेनियस ने कहा, “फ़िलहाल हम कुछ नहीं कर रहे हैं. मैंने अपने साथ काम करने वाले लोगों को ईमेल भेजे हैं और उसने उनके फ्रेंडली जवाब भेजे हैं. अभी के लिए, बस इतना ही बताना चाहूँगा.”
mt: “For now we are doing nothing. I have emailed my colleagues and they have sent friendly replies. For now, that is all I will say.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: इससे पहले, रिंग के सीईओ, जेमी सिमिनॉफ ने बताया था कि कंपनी तब शुरू हुई जब उसके दरवाज़े की घंटी उसके गेराज में स्थित दुकान से सुनाई नहीं देती थी।
mt: Before that, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company started when his doorbell didn't ring from his garage store.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: उन्होंने (जेमी सिमिनॉफ़) कहा, कि उन्होंने एक वाईफ़ाई डोर बेल बनाई है.
mt: She said she had made a Wi-Fi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: सिमिनॉफ़ ने कहा कि 2013 में शार्क टैंक एपिसोड में उनके दिखने के बाद बिक्री में बढ़ोतरी हुई, जहाँ शो पैनल ने स्टार्टअप को पूँजी लगाने से मना कर दिया.
mt: 2013 Shark Tank episode where the show's panelists refused to invest in the startup after it appeared on the show.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017 के अंत में, सिमिनॉफ़ शॉपिंग टेलीविज़न चैनल QVC में दिखाई दिए.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping television channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: रिंग ने अपनी प्रतिस्पर्धी कंपनी ADT कॉर्पोरेशन के साथ एक मुकदमा निपटाया है.
mt: Ring has settled a lawsuit with its competitor ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: जबकि एक प्रायोगिक वैक्सीन इबोला से मृत्यु दर में कमी हो सकती है, अब तक, कोई भी ड्रग्स स्पष्ट रूप से संक्रमण का इलाज करने के लिए प्रमाणितनहीं हुआ है.
mt: While a trial vaccine may reduce mortality from Ebola, no drugs have yet been proven to clearly treat the infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: एक एंटीबॉडी कॉकटेल, ZMapp, ने शुरुआत में इस क्षेत्र में विश्वास दिखाया था, लेकिन औपचारिक अध्ययनों ने संकेत दिया कि मौत को रोकने में प्रत्याशित लाभ की तुलना में इसका लाभ कम था।
mt: An antibody cocktail, ZMapp, had initially shown promise in this region, but formal studies have indicated that the expected benefit in preventing death was less than the benefit of the placebo.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM परीक्षण में, ZMapp ने एक नियंत्रण के रूप में कार्य किया, जिसका अर्थ है कि वैज्ञानिकों ने इसे बेसलाइन के रूप में इस्तेमाल किया और इसके साथ तीन अन्य उपचारों की तुलना की.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp performed as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: अमेरिकी जिमनास्टिक्स, संयुक्त राज्य ओलंपिक समिति के पत्र का समर्थन करता है. साथ ही, सभी एथलीटों को एक सुरक्षित माहौल देने के लिए, ओलंपिक परिवार के होने की अहमियत स्वीकार करता है.
mt: The American gymnastics team supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee. It also acknowledges the importance of being part of the Olympic family to provide a safe environment for all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: हम USOC के इस कथन से सहमत हैं कि हमारे एथलीटों और क्लबों और उनके खेल, हमारे संगठन के भीतर सार्थक बदलाव के साथ आगे बढ़ कर बेहतर सेवा की जा सकती है ना की विप्रमाणन से |
mt: We agree with USOC's statement that our athletes and clubs and their sports, with meaningful change within our organization, can move forward to better service, not with disapproval.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: यूएसए जिमनास्टिक्स एक स्वतंत्र जाँच का समर्थन करता है जो इस बात पर प्रकाश डाल सकता है कि लैरी नासर के बचे लोगों द्वारा इतनी हिम्मत से बताए गए प्रपोर्शन का दुरुपयोग इतने लंबे समय तक चल सकता था और किसी भी आवश्यक और उचित परिवर्तन को अपना सकता है.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent review that could shed light on how Larry Nassar's survivors were so brazenly abused for so long and what any necessary and appropriate changes could be.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: यूएसए जिमनास्टिक्स और यूएसओसी का एक ही लक्ष्य है — एथलीटों को सुरक्षित, सकारात्मक और सशक्त वातावरण में अपने सपनों का अनुसरण करने के लिए जिमनास्टिक्स और अन्य लोगों के खेल को जितना संभव हो सके उतना सुरक्षित बनाना.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal — to provide athletes with a safe, positive and empowering environment in which to pursue their dreams of gymnastics and other sports as safely as possible.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960 के दशक के दौरान, ब्रेझिन्स्की ने जॉन एफ कैनेडी के सलाहकार के तौर पर और उसके बाद लिंडन बी जॉनसन के प्रशासन के लिए काम किया.
mt: 1960s, Brezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976 चयन के दौरान उन्होंने विदेश नीति पर कार्टर को सलाह दी, फिर 1977 से लेकर 1981 तक राष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा सलाहकार (एनएसए) के रूप में हेनरी किसिंजर को सेवा दी.
mt: 1976 in the selection process, he advised Carter on foreign policy, then from 1977 to 1981 as National Security Advisor (NSA) to Henry Kissinger served.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: एनएसए के रूप में, उन्होंने कूटनीतिक रूप से विश्व मामलों को संभालने में कार्टर की सहायता की, जैसे कि कैंप डेविड एकॉर्ड्स, 1978; 1970 के दशक के अंत में अमेरिका-चीन संबंधों को सामान्य बनाना; ईरानी क्रांति, जो ईरान बंधक संकट का कारण बनी, 1979; और अफ़गानिस्तान में सोवियत आक्रमण, 1979.
mt: As National Security Advisor, he helped Carter diplomatically handle world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing American-Chinese relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: जिस फिल्म में रायन गोज़लिंग और एम्मा स्टोन ने मुख्य भूमिकाएँ निभाई हैं, उसे सभी प्रमुख श्रेणियों में नॉमिनेशन किया गया है.
mt: 2017's La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, has been nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: गोसलिंग और स्टोन को क्रमशः सर्वश्रेष्ठ अभिनेता और अभिनेत्री के लिए नामांकन मिला है.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: अन्य नामांकनों में बेस्ट पिक्चर, डायरेक्टर, सिनेमेटोग्राफ़ी, कॉस्ट्यूम डिज़ाइन, फ़िल्म-संपादन, मूल स्कोर, प्रोडक्शन डिज़ाइन, ध्वनि संपादन, ध्वनि मिश्रण और ओरिजनल स्क्रीनप्ले शामिल हैं.
mt: Other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: ऑडिशन (द फ़ूल्स हू ड्रीम) और सिटी ऑफ़ स्टार्स के दो गानो को सर्वश्रेष्ठ मूल गीत के लिए नामांकन मिला. किसी भी अन्य स्टूडियो से ज़्यादा — लायंसगेट स्टूडियो को 26 नामांकन मिले.
mt: 2 songs from the film "The Fools Who Dream" and "City of Stars" from the film "La La Land" were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate Studios received the most nominations with 26.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: रविवार को देर शाम, यूनाइटेड स्टेट्स के राष्ट्रपति डोनाल्ड ट्रंप ने प्रेस सेक्रेटरी के ज़रिए दिए बयान में बताया कि यूएस सेना सीरिया को छोड़ने वाली है.
mt: On Sunday evening, United States President Donald Trump announced in a statement through his press secretary that the U.S. military will be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: तुर्की के राष्ट्रपति रजब तैयब इरदुगान के साथ ट्रंप की फ़ोन पर चर्चा होने के बाद घोषणा की गई थी.
mt: The announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: तुर्की ने आईएसआईएस के लड़ाकों को पकड़ना और निगरानी करना शुरू कर दिया है, बयान में कहा गया है कि यूरोपीय देशों ने प्रत्यावर्तन करने से इन्कार कर दिया है.
mt: Turkey has begun arresting and monitoring Islamic State fighters, a statement said, with European countries refusing to take them back.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: यह न केवल इसकी पुष्टि करता है कि कम से कम कुछ डायनासोर के पंख थे, एक सिद्धांत पहले से ही प्रचलित है, लेकिन यह ऐसी जानकारी प्रदान करता जो जीवाश्म आमतौर पर नहीं कर सकते, जैसे रंग और तीन आयामी अरेंजमेंट.
mt: It not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already in place, but it provides information that fossils usually can't, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: वैज्ञानिकों का यह कहना है कि इस जानवर के रोमछिद्र भूरे और कैरोटीनॉयड के नीचे का रंग भूरा-भूरा था।
mt: The scientists say the animal's pores were brown and the color under the carotenoid was brown-brown.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: यह खोज पक्षियों में पंखों के विकास की पूरी जानकारी भी प्रदान करती है.
mt: The discovery also provides a complete picture of the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: हालाँकि, डायनासोर के पंखों के शाफ्ट पूरी तरह से विकसित नहीं होते हैं और उन्हें रैचिस कहा जाता है. लेकिन उनके पंखों में बार्ब्स और बार्बुल्स जैसी अन्य खूबियाँ होती हैं. शोधकर्ताओं ने अनुमान लगाया है कि डायनासोर की अन्य खूबियों की तरह शायद रैचिस भी बाद में विकसित हुए होंगे.
mt: However, the shafts of the dinosaur's wings are not fully developed and are called rachises. But they have other features like barbs and barbules. Researchers have speculated that perhaps the rachises too evolved later like the other features of the dinosaur.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: पंखों की संरचना से पता चलता है कि उनका उपयोग उड़ान में नहीं, बल्कि तापमान विनियमन या प्रदर्शन के लिए किया जाता था। शोधकर्ताओं ने सुझाव दिया कि, भले ही यह एक युवा डायनासोर की पूँछ हो, लेकिन नमूना वयस्क साहुल दर्शाता है ना कि बच्चे का निचला हिस्सा।
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were used for temperature regulation or display, not flight. Researchers suggest, though the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen shows an adult saurophaganax, not a juvenile.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: शोधकर्ताओं ने सुझाव दिया कि, भले ही यह किसी छोटे डायनासोर की पूंछ है, लेकिन नमूना वयस्क के पंख का लगता है ना कि किसी बच्चे का।
mt: Researchers suggest, although this may be a tail of a small dinosaur, the specimen looks like an adult wing, not a juvenile.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: कल सुबह तुर्की के गाज़ियाँटेप में पुलिस मुख्यालय में एक कार बम विस्फोट हुआ, जिसमें दो पुलिस अधिकारी मारे गए और बीस से अधिक लोग घायल हुए.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and 20+ injured in a car bomb explosion at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: राज्यपाल के कार्यालय ने बताया कि घायलों में से उन्नीस पुलिस अधिकारी थे।
mt: 19 police officers were among the injured.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: पुलिस ने कहा कि उन्हें हमले के लिए ज़िम्मेदार कथित डाएश (आईएसआईएल) लड़ाकों पर संदेह है.
mt: Police say they suspect the alleged Daesh (ISIL) fighters behind the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: उन्होंने पाया कि सूर्य अन्य सितारों के समान मूल सिद्धांतों पर संचालित होता है: मंडल के सभी सितारों की गतिविधि उनके प्रकाश, उनके परिक्रमण द्वारा संचालित थी, किसी और कारण से नहीं।
mt: They found that the sun behaves like other stars: the activity of all stars is driven by their light, their rotation, not by any other cause.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: एक तारे की रॉस्बी संख्या, जो प्लाज़्मा फ़्लो से संबंधित है, का पता लगाने के लिए उसकी चमक और रोटेशन का एक साथ इस्तेमाल किया जाता है,
mt: The Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow, is determined by using the star's brightness and rotation together.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: रॉस्बी संख्या जितनी छोटी होगी, चुंबकीय उत्क्रमण के संबंध में तारा उतना ही कम सक्रिय होगा.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star will be in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: अपनी यात्रा के दौरान, इवासाकी कई मौकों पर परेशानियों में फंस गया था.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki was stranded several times.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: उसे समुद्री डाकुओं ने लूटा था, तिब्बत में पागल कुत्ते ने हमला किया, नेपाल में शादी से भाग निकला और भारत में गिरफ्तार कर लिया गया।
mt: 1. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by mad dogs in Tibet, escaped from a wedding in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n मानक दोनों 2.4 गीगाहर्टज़ और 5.0 गीगाहर्टज़ आवृत्तियों पर काम करता है.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4 gigahertz and 5.0 gigahertz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: यह इसे 802.11a, 802.11b और 802.11g के साथ पीछे की ओर संगत करने की अनुमति देगा, बशर्ते कि बेस स्टेशन में दोहरे रेडियो हों.
mt: This will allow it to be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 600 मेगाबिट/सेकंड के अधिकतम थियोरिटीकल थ्रोपुट के साथ 802.11n की गति अपने पहले वाले चालकों से उल्लेखनीय रूप से बहुत तेज़ है.
mt: 802.11n's speed is significantly faster than its predecessors, with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 megabits per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: डुवैल, जो विवाहित है और उसके दो वयस्क बच्चे हैं, उसने मिलर पर बड़ा असर नहीं किया, जिस से कहानी संबंधित है.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, was not affected by the story, which is related.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: जब टिप्पणी के लिए कहा गया, तो मिलर ने कहा, “माइक सुनते समय बहुत सारी बातें करता है ... मैं तैयार हो रहा था इसलिए वह जो कह रहा था मैं वास्तव में उसे सुन नहीं रहा था”.
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot while listening... I was getting ready so I wasn't really listening to what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “हू ने कहा, हम 2005 के स्तर से 2020 तक उल्लेखनीय अंतर से सकल घरेलू उत्पाद की प्रति यूनिट कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड उत्सर्जन में कटौती करने का प्रयास करेंगे.
mt: “We will endeavor to reduce gross domestic product per unit carbon dioxide emissions by a significant margin from 2005 levels by 2020,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: यह कहते हुए कि वे चीन के आर्थिक उत्पादन के आधार पर बनाए जाएँगे, उन्होंने कटौती के लिए कोई आँकड़ा निर्धारित नहीं किया.
mt: They said they would be based on China's economic production, but did not specify any figures for cuts.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: हू ने विकासशील देशों को “ पुराने तरीकों से प्रदूषण फैलाने से रोकने और बाद में सफाई करने के लिए प्रोत्साहित किया।”
mt: Hu urged developing countries to "prevent pollution from spreading in old ways and then cleaning up later."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: उन्होंने आगे कहा कि “हालाँकि, उन्हें ऐसे दायित्व लेने के लिए नहीं कहा जाना चाहिए जो उनके विकास के चरण, जिम्मेदारी और क्षमताओं से परे हैं.”
mt: “However, they should not be given responsibilities that are beyond their stage of development, accountability and capacity.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: आज 12.00 GMT पर इराक स्टडी ग्रुप ने अपनी रिपोर्ट प्रस्तुत की.
mt: 12.00 GMT today the Iraq Study Group presented its report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: यह चेतावनी देता है कि कोई भी इस बात की गारंटी नहीं दे सकता कि इस स्थिति में इराक में किसी भी तरह की कार्रवाई से सांप्रदायिक युद्ध, बढ़ती हिंसा या अराजकता पर लगाम लगेगी.
mt: It warns that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq in this situation will stop sectarian war, increasing violence or anarchy.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: खुली बहस और मध्य पूर्व की ओर नीति के बारे में संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका में आम सहमति बनाने के लिए रिपोर्ट एक याचिका के साथ खुलती है.
mt: The report opens with a petition for a debate and a policy towards the Middle East in the United States to build consensus.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: यह रिपोर्ट इराक के प्रति प्रशासन की वर्तमान नीति के लगभग सभी पहलुओं के प्रति बेहद आलोचनात्मक है और यह इसकी दिशा में तत्काल परिवर्तन का आग्रह करती है।
mt: The report is highly critical of the administration's current policy towards Iraq and calls for immediate changes in its direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: 78 सुझावों में से सबसे पहला सुझाव यह है कि शत्रुतापूर्ण हस्तक्षेपों के खिलाफ इराक की सीमाओं को सुरक्षित करने और अपने पड़ोसियों के साथ कूटनीतिक संबंधों को फिर से बनाने के लिए, ये साल खत्म होने से पहले कोई नई राजनयिक पहल की जानी चाहिए.
mt: 78 recommendations, the first of which is to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to rebuild diplomatic relations with its neighbors, should be made before the year ends.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: वर्तमान सीनेटर और अर्जेंटीना की प्रथम महिला क्रिस्टीना फ़र्नांडीज़ डी किर्चनेर ने कल शाम ब्यूनस आयर्स से 50 किलोमीटर (31 मील) दूर शहर ला प्लाटा में अपने राष्ट्रपति पद की उम्मीदवारी की घोषणा की.
mt: Current Senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for President last night in the city of La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: श्रीमती किरचनर ने अर्जेंटीना थियेटर में राष्ट्रपति की दौड़ में शामिल होने की घोषणा की, उसी स्थान से उन्होंने ब्यूनस आयर्स प्रांत के प्रतिनिधिमंडल के सदस्य के रूप में सीनेट के लिए अपना 2005 का अभियान शुरू किया था।
mt: Mrs Kirchner announced her candidacy for president from the Argentine Theatre, the same place from which she began her 2005 Senate campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires Province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: तूफ़ान कैटरीना के मद्देनज़र राहत और पुनर्निर्माण पर चल रहे लंबे विवाद से बहस छिड़ गई थी; जिसमें कुछ राजकोषीय रूढ़िवादियों ने “बुश की न्यू ऑरलियन्स डील” का मज़ाक बनाया है.
mt: 2005's Hurricane Katrina relief and rebuilding controversy had sparked debate; some fiscal conservatives had mocked "Bush's New Orleans Deal".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: पुनर्निर्माण की कोशिश की स्पष्ट आलोचना वॉशिंगटन के कथित घनिष्ट लोगों को पुनर्निर्माण के ठेके दिए जाने पर केंद्रित रही है.
mt: The reconstruction effort has been criticized for allegedly giving contracts to Washington's close friends.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: अंतिम संस्कार में शामिल होने के लिए, चार मिलियन से ज़्यादा लोग रोम गए.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: मौजूद लोगों की संख्या इतनी बड़ी थी कि सेंट पीटर्स स्क्वायर में अंतिम संस्कार के लिए हर किसी के लिए पहुँच पाना मुमकिन नहीं था.
mt: The number of people present was so large that access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square was impossible for everyone.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: रोम में अलग-अलग जगहों पर कई बड़े टेलीविज़न स्क्रीन लगाए गए ताकि लोग समारोह देख सकें.
mt: Large screens were set up in different parts of Rome so people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: इटली के कई अन्य शहरों और दुनिया के बाकी हिस्सों में, खासकर पोलैंड में, इस तरह के सेटअप बनाए गए थे, जिन्हें बड़ी संख्या में लोगों ने देखा था।
mt: Such setups were made in many other Italian cities and in other parts of the world, especially in Poland, where they were seen by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: इतिहासकारों ने उन मामलों पर संसाधनों को केंद्रित करने के लिए एफबीआई की पिछली नीतियों की आलोचना की है जो एजेंसी की सफलता की दर को बढ़ाने के इरादे से हल करना आसान है,विशेष रूप से कार चोरी के मामलेा।
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's previous policies of focusing resources on cases that are easier to solve, especially car theft cases, in order to increase the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: कांग्रेस ने वित्त वर्ष 2005 में अश्लीलता के लिए निधिकरण शुरू किया और निर्दिष्ट किया कि एफबीआई को वयस्क पोर्नोग्राफी के लिए 10 एजेंटों को समर्पित करना चाहिए।
mt: 2005 fiscal year, Congress started funding for obscenity and directed that the FBI dedicate 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: रॉबिन उथप्पा ने केवल 41 गेंदों में 11 चौकों और 2 छक्कों की मदद से 70 रन बना कर पारी का सर्वोच्च स्कोर बनाया.
mt: 11 fours and 2 sixes in 41 balls by Robin Uthappa helped him score the highest score of the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: मध्य क्रम के बल्लेबाज सचिन तेंदुलकर और राहुल द्रविड़ ने अच्छा प्रदर्शन किया और शतकीय साझेदारी बनाई.
mt: Middle order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid put up a good performance and put up a century partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: लेकिन, कप्तान का विकेट गँवाने के बाद भारत ने पारी समाप्ति तक 7 विकेट खोकर केवल 36 रन ही बनाए।
mt: But after losing the captain's wicket, India scored only 36 runs for the loss of 7 wickets before the innings was completed.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति जॉर्ज डब्ल्यू बुश एशिया के एक हफ़्ते के दौरे की शुरुआत करते हुए 16 नवंबर की सुबह सिंगापुर पहुँचे.
mt: 16 November 2006: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore early this morning, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: उनका सिंगापुर के उप-प्रधान मंत्री वोंग कान सेंग ने स्वागत किया और उन्होंने सिंगापुर के प्रधानमंत्री ली सिएन लूंग के साथ व्यापार और आतंकवाद के मामले पर बातचीत की.
mt: They were welcomed by Singapore's deputy prime minister, Woon Wan Seng, and held talks with Singapore's prime minister, Lee Hsien Loong, on trade and terrorism.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: मध्यावधि चुनाव में एक हफ्ते तक हारने के बाद, बुश ने लोगों को एशिया में व्यापार के विस्तार के बारे में बताया।
mt: 1 week after losing the mid-term elections, Bush told people about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: प्रधान मंत्री स्टीफन हार्पर ने, पीएमओ में एनडीपी नेता जैक लेटन के साथ मंगलवार की 25 मिनट की बैठक के बाद, अपनी दूसरी रीडिंग से पहले समीक्षा के लिए सरकार के 'स्वच्छ वायु अधिनियम' (क्लिन एयर ऐक्ट) को एक सर्वदलीय समिति को भेजने पर सहमति व्यक्त की है.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP Leader Jack Layton at the PMO, agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" (Clean Air Act) to a multi-party committee for review before his second reading.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: लेटन ने पीएम से मुलाकात के दौरान कंज़र्वेटिव पार्टी के पर्यावरण बिल में बदलाव के लिए कहा था. अब कंज़र्वेटिव पार्टी के पर्यावरण बिल को “पूरी तरह से फिर से लिखने” के लिए कहा जा रहा है.
mt: In a meeting with the PM, Letwin had asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environment bill. Now the Conservative Party's environment bill is being asked to be "completely rewritten".
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: जब संघीय सरकार ने डेवोनपोर्ट, तस्मानिया में मर्सी अस्पताल का वित्तपोषण करने के लिए कदम उठाया, तब राज्य सरकार और कुछ संघीय सांसदों ने नवंबर तक बुलाए जाने वाले संघीय चुनाव की प्रस्तावना में इस कार्य की आलोचना की.
mt: When the federal government stepped in to fund the Mercy Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, state government and some federal senators criticised the work in the lead up to the November federal election.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: लेकिन प्रधानमंत्री जॉन हॉवर्ड ने कहा है कि यह अधिनियम केवल अस्पताल की सुविधाओं को तस्मानियाई सरकार द्वारा नीचे गिरने से बचाने के लिए अतिरिक्त AUD $45 मिलियन देने के लिए था.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the measure was only to provide an extra AUD $45 million to the Tasmanian government to keep hospital services from collapsing.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: ताज़ा-तरीन बुलेटिन के मुताबिक, समुद्री स्तर की रीडिंग बताती है कि वहाँ सुनामी आई थी. पागो पागो और नीयू के करीब सुनामी की कुछ गतिविधि पक्के तौर पर रिकॉर्ड की गई थी.
mt: Latest bulletins indicate that sea level readings show a tsunami occurred.  Some tsunami activity was recorded near Pago Pago and Niué.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: टोंगा में कोई बड़ी क्षति या चोट की सूचना नहीं मिली है, लेकिन बिजली अस्थायी रूप से चली गई थी, जिसके कारण कथित तौर पर टोंगन अधिकारियों को पीटीडब्ल्यूसी द्वारा जारी सूनामी चेतावनी मिलना रुक गई थी.
mt: There have been no reports of major damage or injury in Tonga, but the power was briefly out, which allegedly prevented Tongan officials from receiving a tsunami warning issued by the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: चेतावनी हटा लिए जाने के बावजूद हवाई समुद्र तट या उसके निकट स्थित चौदह विद्यालय बुधवार को बंद कर दिए गए।
mt: 14 schools near the beach or the airport were closed despite the warning being lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति जॉर्ज डब्ल्यू बुश ने घोषणा का स्वागत किया.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: बुश प्रवक्ता गॉर्डन जॉन्ड्रो ने उत्तरी कोरिया की प्रतिज्ञा को “कोरियाई प्रायद्वीप के सत्यापित किए जा सकने वाले डिन्यूक्लियराइज़ेशन को पाने की दिशा में एक महत्वपूर्ण कदम” बताया.
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the pledge "an important step toward the verified denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: अटलांटिक तूफ़ान मौसम का दसवाँ तूफ़ान, उपोष्णकटिबंधीय तूफ़ान जेरी, आज अटलांटिक महासागर में बना है.
mt: 10th Atlantic hurricane, tropical storm Jerry, forms in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: राष्ट्रीय तूफ़ान केंद्र (एनएचसी) का कहना है कि इस समय जैरी का ज़मीन को कोई खतरा नहीं है।
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says there is no threat to land at this time.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: यू.एस. कॉर्प्स ऑफ़ इंजीनियर्स ने अंदाजा लगाया कि 6 इंच बारिश पहले से क्षतिग्रस्त बांधों को तोड़ सकती है.
mt: 6 inches of rain could break levees already damaged by the flood.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: नौवाँ वार्ड, जो तूफ़ान कैटरीना के दौरान 20 फ़ीट तक ऊँचा देखा गया था, वह वर्तमान में कमर से ऊपर पानी में है, क्योंकि पास का बाँध ज़्यादा बढ़ गया था.
mt: 9th Ward, which was seen 20 feet high after Hurricane Katrina, is currently under water up to the waist, as the nearby levee has risen too high.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: पानी लेवे के ऊपर एक खंड में फ़ैल रहा है जिसकी चौड़ाई 100 फ़ीट है |
mt: 100 feet wide crack in the water levee
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: कॉमन्स के प्रशासक एडम क्यूर्डन ने पिछले महीने जब विकिन्यूज़ से बात की थी, तब उन्होंने अपमार्जन पर अपनी निराशा व्यक्त की थी.
mt: In an interview with Wikinews last month, Commons' steward Adam Cuerden expressed his disappointment with Commons' deletion of images.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “वह [वेल्स] शुरू से ही हमसे झूठ बोलता रहा है। सबसे पहले, ढोंग करते हुए कि यह कानूनी कारणों के लिए था। दूसरा, अपनी कला को हटाने के समय तक यह जताते हुए कि वह हमारी बात सुन रहा था।”
mt: “He [Wales] has been lying to us from the start. First, pretending it was for legal reasons. Second, until the time he removed his art, claiming he was listening to us.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: सामुदायिक गुस्से के कारण उस साइट के लिए यौन विषय के बारे में एक नीति का मसौदा तैयार करने के लिए मौजूदा प्रयासों का नेतृत्व किया गया, जो लाखों खुले तौर पर लाइसेंस प्राप्त मीडिया को होस्ट करता है.
mt: In response to community outrage, existing efforts to draft a policy for the site on a sexual subject were led, which hosts millions of openly licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: किया गया अधिकांश काम सैद्धांतिक था, लेकिन सैजिटेरियस गैलेक्सी से बने ऑब्ज़र्वेशन को सिम्युलेट करने के लिए प्रोग्राम को लिखा गया था.
mt: Most of the work was theoretical, but a program was written to simulate observations from the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: टीम जिस प्रभाव के तलाश में थी वह आकाशगंगा के डार्क मैटर और मिल्की वे के डार्क मैटर के बीच ज्वारीय बलों के कारण से होता होगा.
mt: The team was looking for the effect of tidal forces between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: जैसे चाँद पृथ्वी पर एक खिंचाव पैदा कर, ज्वार-भाटे का कारण बनता है, वैसे ही मिल्की वे भी धनु आकाशगंगा पर एक बल लगाता है.
mt: As the Moon pulls tides on Earth, so the Milky Way pulls tides on the Andromeda galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: वैज्ञानिक यह निष्कर्ष निकालने में सक्षम थे कि काला पदार्थ अन्य काले पदार्थ को उसी तरह प्रभावित करता है जिस तरह से आम पदार्थ करता है।
mt: Scientists were able to conclude that the black material affects other black materials in the same way that ordinary materials do.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: यह सिद्धांत बताता है कि आकाशगंगा के आसपास का सबसे गहरा काला पदार्थ प्रभामंडल के रूप में स्थित होता है और यह कई छोटे-छोटे कणों से बना होता है.
mt: The theory suggests that the deepest blackest material around the galaxy is situated in the halo and is made up of many tiny particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: टेलीविजन रिपोर्टों में प्लांट से निकलने वाला सफेद धुआँ दिखाया गया है।
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: स्थानीय अधिकारी संयंत्र के आस-पास के क्षेत्र में निवासियों को चेतावनी दे रहे हैं कि वे घर के अंदर रहें, एयर-कंडीशनर बंद कर दें और नल का पानी न पिएँ.
mt: Local officials are warning residents in the area around the plant to stay inside, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: जापान की परमाणु एजेंसी के अनुसार, प्लांट में रेडियोधर्मी सीज़ियम और आयोडीन की पहचान की गई है.
mt: The Japanese nuclear agency says radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: अधिकारियों के अनुमान के अनुसार साइट पर यूरेनियम ईंधन रखने वाले कंटेनर टूट गए होंगे और लीक हो रहे होंगे.
mt: Officials estimate that containers holding uranium fuel have been breached and leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: डॉ. टोनी मोल ने दक्षिण अफ्रीकी क्षेत्र क्वाज़ुलु-नताल में अत्यंत दवा-रोधी क्षय रोग (एक्सडीआर-टीबी) की खोज की।
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: एक साक्षात्कार में, उन्होंने कहा कि नया प्रकार “बहुत ज़्यादा मृत्यु दर के कारण बहुत चिंताजनक और ख़तरनाक था”.
mt: In an interview, he said the new strain was "very alarming and dangerous because of the very high mortality rate".
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: डॉ मॉल का मानना है कि कुछ रोगियों का अस्पताल में ही संक्रमण हुआ होगा, और इन में कम से कम दो अस्पताल स्वास्थ्य कार्यकर्ता थे।
mt: Dr. Mall said some patients may have been infected in the hospital, and at least two hospital health workers were among them.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
